title: Why is there a need to study the life, works, and writings of Rizal? - Quora

response.answer_text: To the Filipinos, the study of Dr. Jose Rizal’s life is important and needed as he is a symbol of inspiration to the Filipino youth. The Filipino children must be able to to know what Dr. Jose Rizal was fighting for. Filipino children must also know that one can defend his country in a non - violent way as what Rizal has done. Armed only with a pen and paper he was able to fight the colonizers through writing. For more abou philippine culture please visit my Facebook account at Samuel Astacaan Escabarte.
